name: 1-sequelize-typescript-migrations-example
description: Example how to use migrations in sequelize in typescript

scripts.migrate: npm run build && node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:migrate --env development
scripts.migrate:undo: npm run build && node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:migrate:undo --env development
scripts.migrate:undo:all: npm run build && node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --env development
